title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: A sheer outcropping of granite rises high above the ice, blotting out the stars with its solid grey mass.  The outcropping forms a sharp ridge that curves around from west to north to east, its sheer sides scoured down by centuries of grinding ice.

A sheer outcropping of granite rises high above the ice, dominating the skyline with its solid grey mass.  The outcropping forms a sharp ridge that curves around from west to north to east, its sheer sides scoured down by centuries of grinding ice.
